idea-plugin.description: GPU Monitor adds a tool window on the right side to monitor GPU temperatures, usage, and memory usage. Currently only supports single NVIDIA gpu setups.
idea-plugin.name: GPU Monitor
idea-plugin.change-notes:
Changes in 1.2.2

  • Added reset button functionality

Changes in 1.2.1

  • Extended compatability to 2017.2 versions of all IDEs

Changes in 1.2

  • Fixed flickering

Changes in 1.1

  • Added darcula theme.
  • Decreased flickering when moving the tool window.
  • Changed time axis on graphs.

Changes in 1.0

  • Basic functionality added with graphs for GPU temperatures, usage, and memory usage.
